PETITION CIRCULATION – PUBLIC EVENTS

Secure Elections Matter to Marylanders

We are on a mission to prove that Secure and Accurate Elections are something Marylanders believe to necessary for a government of the people by the people. Collection of signatures is well under way, and so far we’ve collected thousands. 

 

Below are the materials you need to get involved. Print the instructions and petition.
